text: Allt Cynhelyg is a semi-natural oak-hazel woodland forming a Site of Special Scientific Interest in Brecknock, Powys, Wales. It has a notable natural population of Meconopsis cambrica (Welsh poppy). ==See also== *List of Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Brecknock Category:Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Brecknock
title: Allt Cynhelyg
